Key Match Events: Yoshinobu Yamamoto allowed one hit over 6⅓ innings
Freddie Freeman homered for the second straight night
Tommy Edman and Teoscar Hernandez also went deep for the Dodgers
Giancarlo Stanton's RBI single in the ninth against Blake Treinen
Alex Vesia relieved with the bases loaded and retired pinch-hitter Jose Trevino on a first-pitch flyout for the save
Post-Match Reflections: Yoshinobu Yamamoto expressed his excitement about the game
Freddie Freeman discussed his ankle injury and the importance of rest
Dave Roberts discussed Yoshinobu Yamamoto's performance and Shohei Ohtani's injury
Miscellaneous Highlights: Shohei Ohtani got hurt on a feetfirst slide when he was caught stealing second base
The game was played at 23° temperature
Others: The game was played at Yankee Stadium
The series is now 2-0 in favor of the Dodgers
Forty-five of 56 teams holding 2-0 World Series leads have gone on to win the title
Aaron Judge went 0 for 4 with three strikeouts and is hitting.150 with six RBIs and 19 strikeouts in 40 postseason at-bats
